title: Argyle Diamonds and Dayglo Pink? EF Education-EasyPost and Rapha Make It Work for 2025 Team Kits
content:
EF Education-EasyPost, EF-Oatly-Cannondale, and EF-Aevolo to wear diamond design in nod to the patterns of the team's heritage.

Read the full article at Argyle Diamonds and Dayglo Pink? EF Education-EasyPost and Rapha Make It Work for 2025 Team Kits on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
